Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vGlobalSalesAnalysis' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vGlobalSalesAnalysis] GO CREATE VIEW vGlobalSalesAnalysis AS SELECT arCompany.CompanyCD, t.BranchID, t.TranDate, t.DrCr, t.TranAmt, t.TranCost, t.IsTranCostFinal, t.SOOrderNbr, t.SOOrderType, t.TranType, i.ItemClassID, class.ItemClassCD as ItemClassDescr, t.InventoryID, i.InventoryCD as InventoryDescr, c.CustomerClassID, cstClass.Descr as CustomerClassDescr, t.CustomerID, acct.AcctName as CustomerName, t.SalesPersonID, t.Released, t.Qty, address.CountryID, invoice.CompanyID as InvoiceBranchID, invoiceBranch.CompanyCD as InvoiceBranchCD, b.BaseCuryID, t.UOM FROM ARTran t INNER JOIN Branch b ON t.CompanyID = b.CompanyID AND t.BranchID = b.BranchID INNER JOIN Customer c ON t.CompanyID = c.CompanyID AND t.CustomerID = c.BAccountID INNER JOIN BAccount acct ON t.CompanyID = acct.CompanyID AND c.BAccountID = acct.BAccountID INNER JOIN InventoryItem i ON t.CompanyID = i.CompanyID AND t.InventoryID = i.InventoryID INNER JOIN INItemClass class ON t.CompanyID = class.CompanyID AND i.ItemClassID = class.ItemClassID LEFT JOIN CustomerClass cstClass ON t.CompanyID = cstClass.CompanyID AND c.CustomerClassID = cstClass.CustomerClassID LEFT JOIN ARInvoice invoice ON t.CompanyID = invoice.CompanyID AND t.TranType = invoice.DocType AND t.RefNbr = invoice.RefNbr LEFT JOIN ARAddress address ON t.CompanyID = address.CompanyID AND invoice.ShipAddressID = address.AddressID INNER JOIN Company invoiceBranch ON invoice.CompanyID = invoiceBranch.CompanyID INNER JOIN Company arCompany ON t.CompanyID = arCompany.CompanyID WHERE t.CompanyID > 0
